mapper.select: select * from( select weixin_info.*, @curRank := @curRank + 1 AS rank from weixin_info,(SELECT @curRank := 0) r order by forwardCount desc ) tab
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO weixin_info ( openId, userName, sex, city, province, country, subscribeTime, createDate, tel ) VALUES ( #{openId}, #{userName}, #{sex}, #{city}, #{province}, #{country}, #{subscribeTime}, #{createDate}, #{tel} );
mapper.update: UPDATE weixin_info SET forwardCount = forwardCount + 1 WHERE openId = #{0};
